titles.title: I Know That My Redeemer Liveth

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
I know, I know…..
that Jesus liveth,
And on the earth…
again shall stand;

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
I know, I know…
that life He giveth,
That grace and pow’r….
are in His hand.

verse.name: v1a
v1b
verse.lines:
I know eternal life He giveth,
That grace and pow’r
are in His hand.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
I know His promise never faileth,
The word He speaks, it cannot die;

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Tho’ cruel death my flesh assaileth,
Yet I shall see…. Him by and by.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
I know my mansion He prepareth,
That where He is there I may be;

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
O wondrous tho’t for me He careth,
And He at last…. will come for me.
